Title: The 5th Wave
Overview: 16-year-old Cassie Sullivan tries to survive in a world devastated by the waves of an alien invasion that has already decimated the population and knocked mankind back to the Stone Age.
Keywords: based on novel, dystopia, alien, alien invasion, human subjugation, environmental disaster, based on young adult novel
production_companies: Columbia Pictures, GK Films, Material Pictures, LStar Capital
Cast: Chloë Grace Moretz, Nick Robinson, Alex Roe
